open.title: FrogFoot Outage | Western & Eastern Cape
open.description: We are observing a possible outage affecting Frogfoot clients in the Western & Eastern Cape, affected clients might experience intermittent connectivity. Frogfoot engineers are investigating the issue. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content: Further impact has been detected and FrogFoot tier 3 engineers are investigating the root cause. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.

open.title: Vumatel Villages | Degraded Speeds During Peak
open.description: Vumatel Villages has informed us of network degradation affecting high-speed packages, 500mbps and 1Gbps respectively, in Pietermaritzburg. Affected clients will experience degraded speeds during peak. Vumatel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha & Delft
open.description: We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha and Delft areas, Western Cape. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.
